content: **yarn** 420 yards total of worsted weight yarn we used 2 skeins of malabrigo washted in #139 pocion **needles** us 8 / 5 mm 32 40 circulars or equivalent type & length in size needed to obtain gauge **notions** 1 stitch marker darning needle scissors measuring tape **gauge** 5 sts & 9 row per inch in garter stitch before blocking **measurements** 41 across & 19 tall
